attributes.action: Local Councils should increase their budget for carrying out road repairs.
attributes.additional_details: Being a keen cyclist, I know only too well how poorly maintained roads can not only be a nuisance, but can quite easily cause a large amount of expenditure to cyclists. Some roads near where I live, in Solihull, have potholes big enough to completely write off wheels, not to mention the injuries that can be caused from hitting one. and I think this is unacceptable. It is for this reason that I believe our local councils should allow a larger budget for carrying out road repairs.
